"Note: 1. The factory firmware is a stable version. 2. Stable firmware updates will still be pushed when \"Allow beta firmware\" is enabled."
Receive beta firmware push to experience latest features

For proper functioning, you need to go to the Flyme official website to downgrade the system to the latest stable version. If you failed, please go to the MEIZU Authorized Service Center and ask the expert for help. Downgrading will wipe all data, please back up in advance

The system will be returned to the latest stable version. When returned, personal data such as contacts will be cleared, all applications will be cleared, and all data such as photos and videos of the disk will be stored. Please pay attention to backup.
The system will downgrade to the latest stable version. For proper functioning, apps, contacts and other personal data will be wiped
The system will downgrade to the latest stable version. For proper functioning, apps, contacts and other personal data, and files in storage such as photos and videos will be wiped
Join in %s and experience the latest functions of Flyme. Quitting the plan will stop updating to the beta version and will wait for the next stable version push, which does not wipe personal data
Join in %1$s and experience the latest functions of Flyme. The system will not update to the version %2$s if you quit.
Thank you for joining in %1$s. Please wait for %2$s system to push
Please wait for the next stable version of the system update push. You can check the system update notice or %s
back to the stable version now
Please wait for the next stable version push after quitted
Will not update to the version %s if you quit

After joining the beta program, you can receive push notifications of beta firmwares and get early access to new features. There may be risks of instability, so please be cautious.

Need to download %s of system update package

Network error, failed to download update
Failed to download due to SD card error
please feedback by the User Support App

"The stable version, revised version of the beta version, is suitable for all users. More perfect functions bring more excellent experience. With great improvement in stability, fluency and power consumption, the stable version is highly performed and recommended for users pursuing version quality. The beta version, revised version of the alpha version, is suitable for challenge-preferred users. Improved and optimized the problems of the alpha version, the beta version provides not only developed new functions, but also stable performance. The alpha version, tailed with the mark “daily”, is available for users whose applications are accepted. The alpha version is frequently updated and provides developing new functions. It’s not fully tested and unexpected errors or bugs may occur. The alpha version is not recommended for daily use."

Incremental package and whole package have the same updating method and contain the same content. Both support for OTA updating. The difference is that the incremental package is based on the iteration of a certain time node and is small. The whole package is all-inclusive, which is suitable for all users to upgrade. The incremental package is provided only in the Update app, which is the safest and fastest way.

"System update generally does not need to wipe data. OTA updating through the Update app needs no data wiping. For manual updating, the system will check the update files and automatically judge the update files and the current version of the system. Please follow the pop-up prompt to operate."

"The system update replaces the original system by overwriting it, making the mobile phone always have new functions without occupying the storage space in the system partition. In terms of the update method: • Downloading updates through the Update app, the update files are first stored in a fixed path. After the updating is completed, the update files in the path are automatically deleted, so there is no impact on the storage space. • Downloading updates in the official website, the update files should be deleted manually. Because the storage path of the update file may be different, to avoid accidental deletion, or deletion failure due to the update file is renamed, users need to manually delete it."

It takes about 5 to 10 minutes to update the system, and the phone heating up a little is normal. Please be patient, do not press the volume button or power button on the side to avoid the update failure.If there is any problem in the update process, please consult and give feedback to user help, Meizu customer service, Meizu community and other channels in time.

The changelog describes new functions and problems repaired. Some changes to system update may vary by version, model, or network carrier, so the changelog is for reference only.Some highlights can be found in Meizu community, official Weibo or WeChat official account and other official channels for more detailed introduction.
What are the differences among stable version, alpha version and beta version?
What is the difference between the incremental package and the whole package of system update push?
Does system update need to wipe data?
Does system updates affect the mobile phone space?
Is the changelog accurate? Why are some descriptions not consistent with the phone?
"Can't update as battery is below 25%. Please charge the phone."
To complete the update, your phone will restart in %s sec.
"Copy the lucky draw code above --> go to Flyme's official account on WeChat --> paste the code into the input field at the bottom and hit Send to enter the lucky draw"
"Successfully updated to Flyme 6. Congrats on getting a lucky draw chance!"
"Thank you for updating! You are rewarded with a lucky draw code. Tap to get code"
This version comes with a lucky draw chance. Tap to get code
You have scheduled an overnight update. System auto-update will be completed when the conditions are satisfied.
"Overnight update was not performed because system didn't go into deep sleep. Please update manually."
"Couldn't complete update verification because of failure to get update file info. Please update manually."
"Couldn't complete update verification because the phone was disconnected from the internet. Please update manually."
"Your system has been rooted. To ensure its proper functioning, it's strongly suggested that you clear your data when updating."
Your system has been rooted and can not be updated using the incremental package. Please download the full update package and try again.
The current update is unavailable. Wait for later push
"Couldn't complete update verification due to a server error. Please update manually."
Please update manually after canceling scheduled update
System will update automatically overnight if battery is sufficient.
Overnight update was not performed because battery was below 50%. Please update manually.
При достаточной скорости беспроводной сети, система автоматически завершит обновление системы.
Update packet check failed. Please go to Flyme website to download again
Your system has been rooted and can not be updated using the incremental package. Please check for the full update package and try again.

This update version is earlier than current system version. For proper functioning, please wipe the following data when downgrading: apps, contacts and other personal data, and files in storage such as photos and videos
